name: Pick of the Litter Books
description: Accepts donations of used books, CDs, DVDs, and vinyl records; proceeds support Peninsula Humane Society & SPCA programs
fullDescription: Pick of the Litter Books is a used bookstore accepting book donations with all proceeds supporting Peninsula Humane Society & SPCA animal welfare programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept used book donations
- Accept CDs and DVDs
- Accept vinyl records
- Affordable used book shopping
- Proceeds support animal welfare
- Benefits PHS-SPCA programs
howToGetIt:
1. Gather books, CDs, DVDs, or records
2. Visit Pick of the Litter store
3. Donate during store hours
4. Or shop for affordable books
5. Support animal rescue programs
6. Find great reading deals
keywords: Pick of the Litter, used bookstore, donate books, book donation, CDs, DVDs, vinyl records, Burlingame, animal welfare, PHS-SPCA
